seo.title: Contact | SustainSage
seo.description: Reach out for a calm, ICF-aligned exploratory chat. Share your context, understand our boundaries, and decide whether coaching is the right next step.

hero.title: A low-pressure way to see if working together makes sense.
hero.body: Share a few lines about what is changing. We respond with clarity and respect your pace.
bullets: We reply within three UK working days.
We start with a short, no-obligation call.
You decide what, if anything, you’d like to book.

journey.title: How the first touchpoint unfolds
journey.intro: Here is what happens after you press send.

items.summary: You send the form or email.
items.detail: We confirm receipt and share a few time options within three UK working days.

items.summary: We meet for a 20-minute exploratory call.
items.detail: We clarify focus, boundaries, fees, and whether coaching fits—no scripts, no pressure.
If coaching helps, we co-design agreements. If not, we signpost resources or suggest other providers.

what_you_get.title: What you get
what_you_get.description: When we coach together you can rely on:
items: Confidential, client-led conversations held in English, Mandarin, or both.
Collaborative experiments, reflections, and tools tailored to your goals.
Honest signposting if another professional or resource would support you better.
Written summaries of agreements so you stay in control of next steps.

what_we_dont_do.title: What we don’t do
what_we_dont_do.description: To respect coaching ethics, we do not:
items: Diagnose, treat, or provide therapy, counselling, medical, legal, or financial advice.
Complete immigration, tax, or legal paperwork on your behalf.
Guarantee job offers, promotions, or specific outcomes.
Work in situations where there is unmanaged risk of harm—we pause and refer instead.

consent.label: I have reviewed the <0>Coaching Boundaries</0> and consent to contact SustainSage about coaching.
consent.helper: Check this to confirm the coaching scope and unlock the contact form.
consent.title: Consent & data
consent.text: By submitting you agree to be contacted about your enquiry. We keep minimal records and respect deletion requests.

form.title: Send us a note
form.subtitle: Short bullet points are enough. You stay in control of what you disclose.
form.highlight: Share as much or as little as you like.
form.name: Name
form.nameHint: Share the name and pronunciation you’d like us to use.
form.emailHint: We only use this to reply about coaching.
form.help: What transition or decision is on your mind?
form.helpHint: Examples: relocating to the UK, returning to work after caregiving, cross-cultural leadership, feeling unsure about next steps.
form.focusHint: Choose the option that feels closest—it is fine to stay uncertain.
form.languageHint: Tell us if you prefer English, Mandarin, or a mix—we can switch mid-session.
form.timezonePlaceholder: e.g. UK mornings, GMT+8 evenings, or flexible
form.timezoneHint: Include your city or time zone plus a rough window for calls.
form.consent: I consent to SustainSage contacting me about coaching.
form.boundariesConsent: I have read and agree to the <0>coaching boundaries</0>.
form.scopeAcknowledgement: I understand this form is for coaching enquiries, not therapy, crisis support, legal, financial, or immigration advice.
form.privacyNote: We store your information only to arrange coaching conversations and delete it if we do not work together, unless law requires otherwise.

status.success: Thank you. We’ll reply within three UK working days.
status.error: Something went wrong. Please try again or email contact@sustainsage.com.
status.errorRequired: Please complete the required fields and confirm consent.

sidebar.title: What to expect
sidebar.description: We keep the process transparent and centred on your consent.
sidebar.responseCopy: We usually reply within three UK working days with a few options for the exploratory chat.
sidebar.privacyCopy: Your details stay between us unless the law requires disclosure. No marketing lists or surprise emails.
sidebar.nextCopy: You choose whether to continue coaching. We summarise agreements and boundaries so you stay in control.
